name: pollinate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to take pollen from one plant or part of a plant to another so that new plant seeds can be produced: Bees pollinate the plants by carrying the pollen from one flower to another.

biology to carry pollen from a male part of a flower to the female part of another flower of the same type pollination noun [ U ] us/ˌpɑl·əˈneɪ·ʃən/
